title: when is urgot getting fixed?
body: why is this broken champ still in the game? super strong early game and mid game andlate game. his ult is ridicuously stupid and you could put urgot anywhere and even a 4 year old would wreck most opponents. they 'fix' champs that are fine, but then they ignore a broken ass ugly ass champ. he doesnt need fixing, he needs to be removed or actually re worked, like to where he is balanced. another great job by riot.
